website_summaries.verdict: Joyce Chen is known for her "Eastern Cookware for the Western Kitchen," and this lid is just that. High-quality, versatile with an Asian flair, but can be used in a western kitchen.
pros: Nonstick steel wok lid is a handy kitchen addition
Will also fit many skillets and also functions as a simple and easy cover for serving dishes
Nonstick interior and exterior and birch wood knob
One unexpected benefit of the sizing is that you can flip the lid upside down and place it inside the wok, making storage a bit easier
It is also great to keep things warm or to prevent spatter all over your cooktop
cons: The screw may rust after several uses and does not match well with the wok

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived it was in a box with a couple of those air bubble things, the wok cover wasn't wrapped in anything, it was dented and the handle was nowhere to be found. What a piece of garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Mellow

customer_reviews.title: I ALWAYS try to find something nice to say
customer_reviews.text: I always try to find something nice to say. It looks like a great lid, and I'm sure it would work great...except that the first lid was bent from poor packaging, and the second lid, though the box was perfect, the lid was seriously warped - more oval than round. Not sure how I got 2 bent lids, but I did. Will try a different one at this point. I really wanted it to work. I think it would have been perfect if it had been round. REPLACEMENT OF FIRST LID AND RETURN OF SECOND LID WAS SUPER EASY. NO PROBLEMS WITH SERVICE.
customer_reviews.author: TRR

customer_reviews.title: Screw inside gets rusty
customer_reviews.text: The Dome lid could've been perfect except for one thing, the screw inside that holds the lid holder from the outside get's rusty when it gets wet. Every time I cook, and I put the lid on, the screw gets rusty really fast and I have to constantly clean it off. Not only that, every time you clean it, it also has black tarry residue.
customer_reviews.author: Randhal Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Got rusty after initial wash.
customer_reviews.text: purchased this because the old one has become rusty. At first I thought i had not taken cared of it, so the lip and inside had become rusted; When this new one arrived, I carefully washed it before my first use. i left it 95% dried. After it was air dried completely, the lip and the inside screw of the cap had become rusty already. Very bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: E jeng

customer_reviews.title: Paired with 14" T-Fal Wok, a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to pair with thebecause it was listed as the most "bought together" product. It is small for the wok. The Wok measures 14.25" while the lid measures 13.25", so it ends up sitting down inside the wok almost an inch down. The quality is good so far. The knob is small but handy.
customer_reviews.author: CDK

customer_reviews.title: Scuffed and dented
customer_reviews.text: This lid arrived scratched and dented. The handle and screw we're each loose and rolling around in the box. The scuffs and dents seem to be caused by the way they are stacked when stored.
customer_reviews.author: J. W. B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits the 14 inch Lodge Wo
customer_reviews.text: Both this along with the Lodge 14 inch wok. Fits and works as you'd expect. I have a aluminum top for the my own steel wok - bought the cast iron wok for my daughter because her rental home has an electric stove. This lid has a non-stick coating that I wonder if it will wear off where it sits on the wok, but probably not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: D Robert

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent lid but screw prone to rust
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product. It's simple and gets the job done. There is a known issue with it. The screw will need to be replaced as it is prone to rust. I wouldn't recommend even replacing with the same one but rather fine a replacement screw. The problem is, I haven't been able to find one of similar size, even at home depot. Anyone know the size of the screw???
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well with our wok and or 15 inch Lodge cast iron skillet.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for our Lodge cast Iron Wok. It also works for our 15 inch lodge cast iron skillet. It was very hard to fid a lid that actually covered it do to it's size and this does the job nicely. You do have to make sure that it is on correctly, (on the skillet), but we have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Joyce Chen wok lid
customer_reviews.text: I do not approve of or cook with non stick surfaced cookware, even lids as this one is. The chemicals leach into the food especially at high temperatures. Why run this risk?
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Large. Deep. Noice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for daily use on a diner flat top grill. The handle easily comes unscrewed, but that is fixed with a bit of heat resistant glue. It's easily wide enough to cover 4 or 5 burgers, and tall enough to stack those burgers with bacon and cheese. It is kind of thin, warps with too much heat, and I don't think it will last a year. The previous one lasted 40 years, 23 of those at my diner.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to be a Joyce Chen
customer_reviews.text: Not sure this is even a Joyce Chen lid. I purchased one a few years back and was throughly pleased with the lid, but this one is definitely not the same quality. Very disappointed as it is a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Fits my authentic hand hammered wok perfectly. I’m a big fan of Joyce Chen products and this kid did not disappoint. Much better quality than previous wok lids I’ve used. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jkhouri

customer_reviews.title: Inner Coating Peels Off
customer_reviews.text: It was great, but after using this wok lid consistently, it did not withstand the test of daily cooking. The inner coating of the lid has started to peel off. I am afraid it will contaminate my food while cooking, thus, I have switched to a lid without a coated surface.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a melting dome at work, and it is great! It can fit aboht 7-8 handpressed, 1⁄2 pound patties at once! The handle doesn't get hot and at the end of the day it's very easy to clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: fevans

customer_reviews.title: Solid so far
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, forms good seal and is easy to use and clean. Fairly sturdy construction. The handle screw did rust after a wash, but it’s only a little and doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality I should have looked before I bought it .. was made in Taiwan . Very light it dents very easily bec it’s made made from very light material poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Goodday

customer_reviews.title: Missing screw for handle
customer_reviews.text: Fine enough product - came with minimal packing and no screw to hold the handle onto the lid. Thankfully I dug through the old screws in my toolbox and had one that fit. Simple lid, moderately nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: Received this cover for my 14 inches wok today. It fixed perfect and easy to clean . Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: nwklee

customer_reviews.title: Ever-so-slightly the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: This cover will work, but given that it's designed to go with a particular wok you'd think they would have sized it so that it didn't land right on that wok's handle rivets. You have to set the lid cockeyed to avoid the rivets and hold in the steam. It's a small enough thing, but a stupid and avoidable design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and light weight
customer_reviews.text: This fits the Bruntmore 14" Wok just fine. I am well pleased with it. I don't think it will take a lot of banging around without damage but then again, neither will I.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: this is the 2nd cover I received. The 1st didn't have a knob for the top. This was the replaced one. The wooden knob has a crack in it and it has been screwed down so tightly the metal has been dented. Fits irregularly on top of my wok. Will work but I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: No good lid
customer_reviews.text: Got rusty the inside part after wash. The inside black coated off. Thats start rusty and smelly .
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: I cant use it for preserving fruit.
customer_reviews.text: Fine. Water pours out when you turn it right side up. Birds pay no attention. They use birdbath.
customer_reviews.author: wilbur cross

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: It was missing an handle when I got it. Sent it back. Customer svc was nice and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie C.

customer_reviews.title: Cooking enjoyment
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoy my new wok, how it quickly heats up and how your food doesn't stick. The only thing that was time consuming was the part of seasoning the wok but I guess its the proper procedure to enjoy cooking with your wok, my question is after cleaning and drying it, I add a few drops of oil to keep it from rusting but the paper towel I use to spread the oil, it doesn't come out clean
customer_reviews.author: felipe rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Rust after one use?
customer_reviews.text: Hmm the bottom screw to hold onto the already rusting after one use?
customer_reviews.author: Quang

customer_reviews.title: Great for the wok!
customer_reviews.text: Received item as described in a timely manner. Fits my wok perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: JQS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for daily cooking
customer_reviews.text: Best cover ever, easy to clean, no gap or hidden corner for grease and water.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, not made for the 14 inch Wok
customer_reviews.text: This is not made for the 14 inch Wok. It sinks into the walk, so most of the time we don’t use it, but it isn’t horrible to have around.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Chavana

customer_reviews.title: Good top
customer_reviews.text: This is fine. I prefer bare metal. Just not big on coated metal. This is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shpidoinkle

customer_reviews.title: excellent wok lid
customer_reviews.text: I do not believe this item is flimzy It would take superman to dent it.
customer_reviews.author: mr Richard

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We've used this for a few months and it's been great! No rust or problems. It works great with the 14" wok we bought!
customer_reviews.author: Allison H

customer_reviews.title: Little bit more 'wonkie' then I was expecting but I ...
customer_reviews.text: Little bit more 'wonkie' then I was expecting but I don't necessarily know how wok lids are supposed to fit. So if it's supposed to air tight, it definitely wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok Cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this wok cover, not the prettiest. but definitely strong enough to keep its shape and very easy to clean. Best of all non-stick. 5 star to seller as well for delivery, packaging handling and speed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy woking
customer_reviews.text: These lids are a necessity for a wok...not flat for a pan. It does it's job. Cleans easy. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Porter

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 main defect
customer_reviews.text: The screw on the inside of the wok lid started to rust over time. Everything else was good in construction except this small area. If you buy this, watch out that the screw that holds the top will rust!
customer_reviews.author: Carlin Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Can use!
customer_reviews.text: The first delivery has been deformed and can only be returned for exchange. It is good to receive it afterwards,The reason for giving 3 stars is because the screws inside will rust!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very lightwt.
customer_reviews.text: I 1st gave it 5 stars, now down to 2 for the purpose I use it for. I have a 14" iron wok, and the lid fits snugly. It is very lightweight and doesn't hold the steam in to cook efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: SueT.

customer_reviews.title: Quality  pan
customer_reviews.text: Great pan, do a lot of stir fry and heats evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Good Wok lid
customer_reviews.text: I use this for steaming fish in my wok . it works great
customer_reviews.author: Jim Francis

customer_reviews.title: It sits funny on the rivets
customer_reviews.text: Lid is to small for the 14” Joyce Chen pro wok. It sits funny on the rivets. Should be a bigger lid. Also feels a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: R & W

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Lid
customer_reviews.text: I had hopes of returning this product, but waited too long. The top of the lid was dented in (the box itself was in good condition). There are three dents on top of the lid now, after popping out the dent. The handle and the texture of the lid feels cheap as well.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Not fitted
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, but the first time I received it without the top node handle, and the second time I received it, I found out the cover is not round Shao, not fitting my wok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pot cover
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely cover, when does the metal smell goes away?
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the lid's fault, but it doesn't fit my 13.5" wok tightly - it sets down-in about 1/2"
customer_reviews.author: Warren M Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good, loose handle
customer_reviews.text: A wok lid is really important to have around and I use it all the time. This one is nice. It is light but not flimsy and fits perfectly over my flat bottom T-Fal wok and it easy to clean. It's a lid, there aren't too many features to talk about. It covers my food while it's cooking. It works well as a steam shield so you don't scald your face and arms. My only gripe is that I have to take a screwdriver to tighten to handle/knob on the top about once a month. It just tends to spin through use. Otherwise I'm happy with it and it seems like a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: No Name

customer_reviews.title: Wok living
customer_reviews.text: Great 👍🏽 for my Vegan 🌱 life... money saver for my Asian cuisine🥰
customer_reviews.author: Ceeyuloveme

customer_reviews.title: Very think alluminum.. damaged in shipping after ordering ...
customer_reviews.text: Very think alluminum.. damaged in shipping after ordering twice. It will work but one fall and it is done with its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kibutz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lid was ordered with wok, suggested item, but it doesn’t fit right.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my T-Fal 14" wok - the lid measures barely 13"
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why, but the lid I got measured only 13" across (barely) and didn't fit my T-Fal 14" wok at all. Amazon was great in issuing a return for it, so I'm happy, but buyer beware that this like is 13" across, and to measure your wok diameter to make sure this will fit. Otherwise it seems like a quality lid.
customer_reviews.author: Dariushd

customer_reviews.title: False advertising-
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because it stated it fits a 14" Wok. That is false, it in fact did not fit my 14" wok. It was far too small.
customer_reviews.author: livielance

customer_reviews.title: Not-so-good quality item
customer_reviews.text: After a few washes, you can see that the internal sides start to rust. You'd think that they'd use stainless steel, but the thing that is keeping it from rusting is just the coat of paint. On areas where the paint doesn't reach, it will rust. You can still use it as a lid because the rusted part doesn't come into contact with food. But it doesn't deserve a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY! The wooden handle is screwed into the ...
customer_reviews.text: STAY AWAY! The wooden handle is screwed into the lid from the inside, but the screw ALWAYS STRIPS OUT. We bought these, and within days the screws stripped out. There was also a problem with shipping, one was dented when it arrived, and warped. We complained, got a replacement set and they also stripped out immediately. There is a serious design flaw with these, the screws will strip out of the wooden handle every single time. Do NOT BUY...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy G. Howard

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time in good condition. Was a gift along with T-fal A80789 ...
customer_reviews.text: Product as stated, arrived on time in good condition . Was a gift along with T-fal A80789 Specialty Nonstick Dishwasher Safe Oven Safe PFOA-Free Jumbo Wok Cookware, 14-Inch, Black. All reports are that both are great and meet the needs.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: missing handle
customer_reviews.text: Hi, we just received the product but missing the handle, it's not in the box. It is possible to just send us the handle to save us time? Please advice. thank you, Fely
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Ann Delapena

customer_reviews.title: good quality and fits my wok perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, good quality and fits my wok perfectly. Used it on a once a week basis over 7 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: ckng60060

customer_reviews.title: top wooden handle is loose
customer_reviews.text: large enough for my kitchen, but top wooden handle is loose
customer_reviews.author: hong wen

customer_reviews.title: Good overall. Handle keeps coming loose.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however the handle at the top keeps getting loose and starts spinning around after each use. Just a heads up!
customer_reviews.author: FlyingDuchess

customer_reviews.title: Lid is damaged
customer_reviews.text: The lid was ok, Amazon shipping damaged the lid. Too much work to exchange!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Z.

customer_reviews.title: worked as expected seems to be good quality, fits as described on 14" wok
customer_reviews.text: used it last night, worked as expected seems to be good quality, fits as described on 14" wok, did well for my use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Received as described - only complaint (typical): manufacturers always ...
customer_reviews.text: Received as described - only complaint (typical): manufacturers always attach the knob; handle as cheaply as possible and it will strip out shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 14 inch non stick dome lid
customer_reviews.text: I been looking for lid for my lodge cast iron wok then seen this lid for to buy many time never bought it because i was not sure it is not enough strong weight is only one pound.Trust me it is very strong for useing for long time .I really happy with purchase. thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: seema sony

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I use cast iron to cook for years. I am pretty sure that this so call "cast iron" product has a significant issue. It's coating will drop graduately, like others in the review. However, this kind of situation should never occur in a cast iron product.
customer_reviews.author: Chanfee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit if your wok needs a lid
customer_reviews.text: Perfect kid for my wok that didn’t come with one. Well made and looks good...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goode

customer_reviews.title: Made very cheaply
customer_reviews.text: Works well and exactly as expected. However, the screw underneath rusts very easily and frequently. An alcohol pad cleans it right up but it is annoying. Also, I have to repeatedly tighten the screw. The heat always makes the screw loose which makes the knob handle loose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good no nonsense lid
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use with the Lodge 14" cast iron wok. The fit is good. The black matches the wok well. As for the construction, it felt lighter than other lids I have for the other work.
customer_reviews.author: tinman

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this lid for the T-fal 14" wok, ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lid for the T-fal 14" wok, and is a bit too small. I took out the ruler and measured them both. T-Fal is 14.5" and the lid is 13.5". It'll still work but the lid will be sitting about 1.5" down in the wok.
customer_reviews.author: KYM

customer_reviews.title: The right wok
customer_reviews.text: A perfect fit for the Joyce Chen 31-0066, 13.5-Inch. I got this as a gift for someone that I had already given the above wok and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s was smaller then what I needed but it will work for now
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Warps and bends easily. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheap. It was warped and dented before it even arrived. Imagine what happens when you attempt to reshape it and put it on a very hot wok.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without the bolt/screw.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the knob for the lid not attached and there is no screw or bolt included.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: This lid is perfect for our Joyce Chen 21-9978 Classic Series 14 inch ...
customer_reviews.text: This lid is perfect for our Joyce Chen 21-9978 Classic Series 14 inch carbon steel wok! We have had no issues with flaking on the inside like a few other reviewers posted.
customer_reviews.author: sjeggers

customer_reviews.title: Had the same dents in the lid
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Arrived as the other pictures with dent in the lid. I pushed the lid back into place and will still use it. Not worth the money though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Noyes

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Arrived unwrapped. With no handle. Very thin lid. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: marla j.

customer_reviews.title: wok cover
customer_reviews.text: The size described to fit the size of the wok did not fit to the size of the wok as described . It was not a fit , it was too much centered .
customer_reviews.author: Frene Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but I wish it was a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but I wish it was a little bit smaller spherical making a little bit flatter(?) maybe(?)..this is huge for me to use and store in my kitchen..
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: light but sturdy and seems well made
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for; light but sturdy and seems well made. Will have to see how the finish holds up over time. Made in Taiwan.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match to wok purchased from Target
customer_reviews.text: Good seal and keeps heat in wok for good cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wong

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty by any stretch
customer_reviews.text: Light weight construction, it clearly will not last in an active kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleSlug

customer_reviews.title: Scratched lid with no knob.
customer_reviews.text: This lid was place in box with other items not rapped just placed in. Large scratch and no knob to place lid on and off wok!! Would give no star if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy cover but I didn't pay for the multiple extra deep scratches
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But good quality.
customer_reviews.text: its ok, I didn't really need it though. But good quality.
customer_reviews.author: mwenye k seville

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Lodge 14 inch Wok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lid based on a reviewer who stated that it fits the 14 inch Lodge Wok. It does. Not perfectly but nicely. The stainless steel is a bit on the thin side. But it gets the job done. Holds in the heat, flavor,and condensation.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Blue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a lid that does what it's supposed to do, not much else you can say about it.
customer_reviews.author: burgys

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: This top arrived with no handle to pick it up!
customer_reviews.author: I. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple compliment to the wok and important as an essential accessory.
customer_reviews.author: gptraveler

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Not much to say about a lid
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to compliment my new Lodge cast iron wok. Looks great. Not much to say about a lid. It does what it has to do. Planning to buy another for another wok.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased to go with the wok I got ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to go with the wok I got for my daughter-in-law, who is from China. It doesn't get as much use as the wok does, but it complements the wok perfectly when it is used.
customer_reviews.author: S J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly with my Lodge 14" cast iron wok.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason Lodge doesn't make a lid for its 14" cast iron wok, but no worries, this one fits perfectly. The quality is excellent, the knob is just the right size, and it matches the Lodge wok perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: NCSTec

customer_reviews.title: These are standard in Asia
customer_reviews.text: My wife is from Hong Kong. My wok wasn't big enough. We got a nicer one, but it didn't have a lid. Thankfully I found this. Do you have a lidless wok? Get this!
customer_reviews.author: Eric In Beaverton

customer_reviews.title: Wedding Gift
customer_reviews.text: A couple registered for a wok on Amazon.com - I completed the set with this product, the Bamboo Utensils and filled it with Sake - Chili Sauce- Soy Sauce- Chop Sicks - Rice and Fortune Cookies. It was a big hit! All the guests at the wedding were commenting on it! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Kamaley

customer_reviews.title: Great 14" Wok Lid
customer_reviews.text: We just replaced our 14" Wok with a better quality Wok, but it did not come with a lid. This Steel Dome Lid is well constructed of quality material and fits just inside the 14" Wok, not too heavy to be cumbersome. This was a Christmas gift for my husband, th Thai Food Master! TWO THUMBS UP!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lid with a "soft" item after seeing some of the reviews from other buyers who said it arrived dented and warped because they ordered a heavy item with it (like a cast iron wok). One reviewer even said it was cheap material. Well, I'm on here to say this is a great product. It's a fairly heavy guage steel for a lid. Fits my wok perfectly! It arrived well packaged and undamaged. If I have a friend looking for a wok lid I will definately recommend this one to them...and you! Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. O'Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would have preferred it be just a teensy bit smaller
customer_reviews.author: Honkwomp

customer_reviews.title: My Christmas day was not pleasant
customer_reviews.text: When i opend the box it came out ruined i was so ashamed towards my friends. Bad quality
customer_reviews.author: Khalid

customer_reviews.title: No Knob
customer_reviews.text: My product came with no knob for the lid. Also this looks very simple you can likely get the same at an Asian grocery store. The most important is to have a good wok which is what amazon is for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The screw was missing so I had to purchase the screw from Home depot
customer_reviews.author: KIMHEAB

customer_reviews.title: Covered
customer_reviews.text: Fits my cast iron wok perfectly and I love the lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: ESTRIANA

customer_reviews.text: WE use this product at least once a week. Fits our wok and works just as it should. Yay Joyce Chen.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie M.

product_meta.title: Joyce Chen 31-0066, 13.5-Inch Nonstick Steel Dome Lid for 14-Inch Wok
product_meta.description: Joyce Chen 31-0066, 13.5-Inch Nonstick Steel Dome Lid for 14-Inch Wok. Joyce Chen's slogan "Eastern Cookware for the Western Kitchen," reflects her focus on providing high-quality, versatile tools and products that have Asian flair, but can be used in a western kitchen. This Nonstick Steel Wok Lid is a handy kitchen addition, designed to fit 14-inch woks. If you've lost your lid or started your Joyce Chen cookware collection with a gift that didn't include a lid here's what you've been without. Will also fit many skillets and is a simple and easy cover for serving dishes. Features nonstick interior and exterior and birch wood knob. Joyce Chen opened her first restaurant in Cambridge, Massachusetts in 1958. The restaurant flourished, and in 1973 a larger Cambridge restaurant was opened. Chen also began writing Chinese cookbooks and in the 1970s began hosting a cooking show on public television. She found that the selection and quality of Chinese cookware in America didn't live up to her high standards so she developed her own. Today, Joyce Chen Products come from all over the Pacific Rim to bring the best of Asia to you.
feature_bullets: Fits 14-inch diameter woks; Lid size 13.5-inch diameter
